no_internet_connection_using_fallback_ra: You have no internet connection! Using exchange rates from
connect_again_to_internet: Connect to the internet again to get the most up-to-date exchange rates.
choose_decimal_digits: Choose how many decimal digits you want to use
choose_decimal_digits_for_crypto: Choose how many decimal digits you want to use for crypto currencies

no_data_to_show: You have no data to show. Make sure you have internet connection to get the data from the server.
